The rest of the Eclipse plugins as binary.
Suddenly when I attempt to synchronized I get the following exception:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must include project and resource 
name: /org.apache.xerces

This isn't happening in CVS code. Instead it looks like a problem with the build
manager as a result of a sync info change via ISynchronizer.flushSyncInfo().
*** Bug 39872 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Please reopen if reproduced on a newer build.
